post.body: I am making a website on here, and I'm ready to publish it, but when I go into.. I guess you would call it the sites menu... it says missing files, and lists the picture I have on the front page. How would I fix this?

comment.body: I have done that. It gave me the little check mark in top right corner, but it still says content missing. Is there something I have to do with the content.json file?
